newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Oct 7.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Oct 7.

text.p: These are significant stories in the Ivorian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy. FRATERNITE MATIN - Four civil servants detained for a third time in connection with embezzlement case involving fugitive Lebanese businessman Roger Nasra - Ivory Coast's commercial capital Abidjan under close surveillance as part of the fight against violent crime LA VOIE - Ivorian government relaunches investigation in the case of about 20 soldiers detained in connection with an alleged coup attempt at the time of the October 1995 presidential election LE JOUR - Humiliating 4-1 defeat for Ivory Coast's national soccer squad, the Elephants, against Algeria in the African Nations Cup - Internal squabbles undermine Ivorian banana and pineapple sector. -- Abidjan newsroom +225 21 90 90
